Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan are set to play their first-ever bilateral T20I series against India.
The upcoming three-match T20I series will commence on 11th January at IS Bindra Stadium in Mohali.
Afghanistan have a good amount of experience playing in Indian conditions and they will pose a big threat with their spin attack.
Afghanistan will purely bank on their spin-bowling attack against India in the upcoming three-match T20I series.
Indian batters have good numbers against spinners which can help them fight back.
Rinku Singh and Yashasvi Jaiswal have changed the gear for India in T20Is.
